title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practice Competencies: Fundamentals of Colorectal Cancer Molecular Subtype Prediction Using Deep Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (functions, graph comprehension) and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can visually analyze H&E-stained tissue image patterns and describe key features.
Learners can understand the fundamental principles of deep learning models (neural networks, learning processes) from a mathematical perspective.
Learners can build a simple classification model for a given image dataset and evaluate its performance using the AUC metric.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
